test_description: This test covers SQL concepts including DDL, DML, complex queries, integrity constraints, JDBC, security, and indexing.

questions.question: Which SQL command is used to create a new table?
What is the purpose of the GROUP BY clause in SQL?
questions.options_a: To group rows that have the same values in specified columns

questions.question: Which SQL function returns the number of rows that match a criteria?
What does the HAVING clause do in SQL?
Which type of SQL query contains another query within it?
What is the purpose of the PRIMARY KEY constraint?
questions.options_a: To uniquely identify each record in a table

questions.question: Which SQL command is used to remove rows from a table?
What is the purpose of JDBC in database programming?
questions.options_a: To provide a Java API for database connectivity

questions.question: Which SQL command is used to grant privileges to users?
What is an index in a database?
questions.options_a: A data structure that improves retrieval speed
questions.options_b: A table that lists all other tables

questions.question: Which SQL keyword is used to eliminate duplicate rows in the result?
What is the purpose of a stored procedure?
questions.options_a: To store a set of SQL statements for reuse

questions.question: Which SQL command is used to change data in existing rows?
What is a view in SQL?
questions.options_a: A virtual table based on the result of a query

questions.question: Which SQL operator is used to combine the result of two SELECT statements?
What is the purpose of a cursor in database programming?
questions.options_a: To retrieve and process rows one at a time

questions.question: Which SQL constraint ensures that a column cannot have NULL values?
What is the purpose of the COMMIT command in SQL?
questions.options_a: To permanently save changes made in a transaction

questions.question: Which type of join returns all rows from both tables with NULLs where matches don't exist?
What is the purpose of the WITH clause in SQL?
questions.options_a: To define a temporary result set for use in a query
